title: Katie Holmes looks incredible in a LBD as she puts on glamorous parade in NYC
text:

Katie Holmes is one of the most beautiful actresses in Hollywood.

The mother-of-one, 40, made a super glam arrival at the La MaMa Experimental Theatre Club 2019 Gala at La MaMa Experimental Theatre Club, in New York City on Tuesday.

Katie was every inch the movie star she is when she put on a stylish parade in a black minidress.

Ruching detailing on the LBD drew attention to the American rose's small waistline while she hit the streets of New York.

Batman Begins star Katie raked her free hand through her glossy straight locks as she preened her appearance on the move.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

Brightening up the streets of the Big Apple, the Dawson's Creek star applied vivid red lipstick.

Katie showed no signs of heartbreak as she continues to mend after she split from Hollywood hunk Jamie Foxx in August.

She is yet to be seen with someone new since the break up.

The couple were believed to have romanced in secret and kept their love life out of the headlines for six years.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Previously, Katie was married to Tom Cruise but since their split she has had full custody of their 13-year-old daughter Suri.

The actress tied the knot with the actor in 2006, yet it wasn't meant to last as she filed for divorce in 2012.

Katie is usually inseparable from her young daughter as they often enjoy mother-daughter days out.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

In the past, the mother shared how Suri was the "most important person" to her.

She told Town & Country in 2017: "My child is the most important person to me, and her upbringing is paramount to my work right now.

"It's very important that I'm present and she has a stable, innocent childhood. I feel so blessed to do what I do, but there's nothing in the world better than watching your child succeed."
description: Katie made a stylish statement when she glided through the streets of New York City in a little black dress
